text: I'm Clarence Walters I'm a data

Jimmy actively encourages its employees
to upskill themselves on the job and it
also provides a number of different
training strategies for this Amazon
agreed to partner with Jamie to provide

classroom based training the combination
of the actual classroom based training
with hands-on labs and interaction with

information that is covered is also
available afterwards online and is
